content.body: Like I said, in langs where you can write your clauses like `_ if(x) -> ...;`, there's no need for a bare if. But here it's `when (_) if(x) {...}`, so it's annoying enough that letting you drop the do-nothing nine-character prefix is probably worthwhile.
